tasks.title: Setup Project Repository
tasks.description: Initialize the project repository for Unblock using Git and create the initial folder structure for frontend and backend.
tasks.details: Create a Git repository on GitHub. Set up the folder structure: /frontend, /backend, and /docs. Initialize package.json in both frontend and backend directories using npm init.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify repository creation and folder structure by cloning the repo and checking the directory layout.

tasks.title: Implement User Authentication
tasks.description: Set up user authentication using Supabase for user registration and login functionality.
tasks.details: Integrate Supabase Auth in the backend. Create API endpoints for user registration and login. Use JWT for session management.
tasks.testStrategy: Test user registration and login flows, ensuring users can create accounts and log in successfully.

tasks.title: Develop Thought Dump Feature
tasks.description: Create the Thought Dump page where users can input free-form text to extract tasks.
tasks.details: Implement a text area for input and a submit button. Use OpenAI API to process the input and extract tasks. Display suggested tasks to the user.
tasks.testStrategy: Input various text samples and verify that tasks are extracted correctly and displayed.

tasks.title: Task Structuring Logic
tasks.description: Implement the logic to structure tasks from the thought dump, including title, description, priority, and duration.
tasks.details: Create a function that takes the extracted tasks and structures them into the required format. Use AI/NLP for task breakdown and subtask generation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with different thought dumps to ensure tasks are structured correctly and subtasks are generated as needed.

tasks.title: Integrate Calendar APIs
tasks.description: Set up integration with Google Calendar and Microsoft Graph for syncing user calendars.
tasks.details: Implement OAuth2 for both Google and Microsoft Calendar APIs. Create endpoints to fetch and sync free/busy time slots.
tasks.testStrategy: Test calendar integration by syncing events and checking for correct free/busy status.

tasks.title: Focus Session Timer Implementation
tasks.description: Develop the focus session timer functionality, allowing users to start timed sessions for tasks.
tasks.details: Implement a timer component that supports Pomodoro and custom lengths. Track session duration and interruptions.
tasks.testStrategy: Run multiple focus sessions and verify that the timer functions correctly and logs interruptions.

tasks.title: Energy & Distraction Tracking
tasks.description: Create functionality for users to rate their energy levels and log distractions during focus sessions.
tasks.details: Add UI elements for energy rating (1-5 scale) and distraction logging. Store this data in the energy_logs and distractions tables.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct focus sessions and ensure energy ratings and distractions are logged accurately.

tasks.title: Task Completion Loop
tasks.description: Implement the logic for marking tasks as complete, skipped, or deferred, and rescheduling incomplete tasks.
tasks.details: Create functions to update task status and automatically reschedule incomplete tasks based on user preferences.
tasks.testStrategy: Test task completion scenarios to ensure tasks are marked and rescheduled correctly.

tasks.title: Reporting & Trends Dashboard
tasks.description: Develop a dashboard to display weekly stats, energy curves, and distraction heatmaps.
tasks.details: Create a reporting interface that aggregates data from tasks, focus sessions, and energy logs to provide insights to users.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the dashboard displays accurate statistics and trends based on user data.

tasks.title: User Interface Design and Styling
tasks.description: Implement the UI using Next.js and TailwindCSS, ensuring a modern and responsive design.
tasks.details: Design and implement the UI for all pages, including Thought Dump, Task Review, Focus Session, and Reporting, using TailwindCSS for styling.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct usability testing to ensure the UI is intuitive and responsive across devices.
